name: pieui
description: A React component library featuring PieCard component

scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:esm && bun run build:cjs && bun run build:types && bun run build:cli
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.esm.js --format esm --target browser --minify --external react --external react-dom --external react/jsx-runtime
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outfile dist/index.js --format cjs --target node --minify --external react --external react-dom --external react/jsx-runtime
scripts.build:cli: bun build src/cli.ts --outfile dist/cli.js --format cjs --target node
